type.label: Powershell
type.description: Execute Powershell script on Windows host

property.name: errorActionPreference
property.description: Determines how Windows PowerShell responds to a non-terminating error (an error that does not stop the cmdlet processing) at the command line or in a script, cmdlet, or provider, such as the errors generated by the Write-Error cmdlet.

property.name: warningPreference
property.description: Determines how Windows PowerShell responds to warning messages generated by a script, cmdlet or provider, such as the messages generated by the Write-Warning cmdlet.
